data.title: Antland Productions
data.meta_description: Roy Yokelson – Antland Productions:SAG-AFTRA approved audio book producer, sound designer, voice-over coach, VO demo producer and casting director
data.text:
About Antland Productions

For over 40 years Emmy Award winning sound designer, recording engineer, and producer/director “Uncle Roy” Yokelson has been helping the voiceover and music industries with education and technical support. If it has ANYTHING to do with audio, Antland Productions is the only company you’ll ever need.

Roy is a SAG-AFTRA approved audiobook director/producer.

Voice Over Support Services

Coaching with Uncle Roy

"If we can't have fun, what's the point?!"

2 Hour Evaluation / Performance Coaching

Is voiceover right for you? Before you spend lots of money on equipment, demos, branding, and marketing, let us help you decide. Practice scripts and direction are provided in the many genres of voiceover: commercial, narration (eLearning, explainer, in-show narration, corporate, medical), telephony, promo, gaming, animation, political, etc.

1 Hour Follow Up

Sometimes 2 hours of fun just isn’t enough

Schedule your FREE home studio evaluation with Uncle Roy.

Testimonials

With Uncle Roy, you don’t just record a demo.

You have an experience … which is likely why he’s everyone’s favorite Uncle.

Marc Scott

Thanks again, Roy B. Yokelson! I definitely got my money’s worth and highly, Highly, HIGHLY recommend anyone thinking about buying a session with you, they need to definitely do it. Thank you for steering me on the right course with my audio!

Jeff Geaghan

You know what’s fun? I unearthed a short video I shot of my very first Uncle Roy Bash – where the only people I knew were J. Michael Collins and Uncle Roy himself. Now, years later, after having met so many outstanding people, I recognize so many of these faces. So awesome to feel “part of”…. Thanks everyone!

Jim Cooper VO

So last week I worked with Roy B. Yokelson of Antland Productions to learn some amazing tricks with Adobe Audition.

A fantastic investment, because a week later, I was able to bang out some SWEET Auditions that got me a Character Commercial!

Ian Fults

I have been using Audacity for YEARS, a great piece of software, but even with my experience with Adobe products like Photoshop, After Effects and Premier, I was a tad daunted how that would translate to Adobe Audition.

Roy B. Yokelson of Antland Productions not only showed me the tricks I can use with it, but literally set the program up with quick keys for me to make the workflow .. well . . FLOW!

Ian Fults

Yes! So much fun!!!Thank you Uncle Roy for my fabulous new Audio in my new space!!

Tara Langella

My life will never be the same.

Darren Sapp

New house means new studio means new acoustics.

Roy B. Yokelson hooked me up before and no one’s ever complained about my sound so OF COURSE I went back to him to make my audio shine. Went into the wee hours with this setup and it was well worth it! If you want to be the best you gotta work with the best. Thanks Uncle Roy!

Andrew Lander

Once again, a big thank you to Roy B. Yokelson for a quick fix for a couple of AA 3.0 problems I was having. It’s amazing what 45 years of experience can do!

Matt Craig

Thanks to Uncle Roy from @antland_productions for helping me get sound back into my recording session today! I’m happy.

Christina Aguinaga

Thanks again for a great session, Uncle Roy!! I learned a lot – I’m feeling grateful, too! 🙏😊

Joan Covino

Thanks Uncle Roy! I had a lot of fun doing my demo recording, especially with Dottie the cat providing calming purring noises!

Sean Mahan

Team, Roy B. Yokelson is pure class. More of him in the world please.

Tim Ratledge

Tell you what, Roy B. Yokelson: You’ve reformed my Adobe Audition ways. The two hours I spent with you will save me many, many hours of editing and production time. It was money well spent…no, make that money well invested…

Ray Hoffman

Learned a lot and had fun at the same time! Thanks Uncle Roy!

Deidre Ann Johnson

If you’ve been a social butterfly in the US voice over community, you know this man. In fact, he is your uncle. Uncle Roy Yokelson. Owner of Antland Studios, owner of a very rusty classic car. He’s a sound engineer, demo producer, voice over coach, and recording expert. But most of all, Roy is a true Mensch.

Paul Strikwerda

nethervoice

Uncle Roy set me up with his life-changing, Twisted Wave Editing Quick List, walking me through each step of the process… and being pretty darn entertaining the entire time. If you need tech help, there’s none better! Put your money where your mouth is… hire Uncle Roy!

Lorena Belcher

You are the best. I recorded 4 auditions this afternoon and followed your guidelines. Not only did you save me an incredible amount of time, but wow, I sound so much better. Hopefully I will move from being Shortlisted to Hired.

Ellen Press

Uncle Roy,

I just wanted to thank you again for the time yesterday with everything. I practiced yesterday after our session with 5 different reads and edited each one as per the list. I was sent an audition today and cleaned it very nice for my agent. I feel much more confident editing and ready to take on the world!! Thank you

Paul Hansen

I have to say, your process has saved me HOURS of work already. Thank you again for everything you give and share to the community!

Hilary P. Buuck

Voice Over Artist

I appreciate the way you teach…customized for me. 🙂

Thanks again. The set up is indeed life-changing. 🙂

Barbara H

I cannot even start to tell you what your counsel has done for the efficiency and the quality with which I now do my work. Both parts of that process are now vastly improved. How did I ever enter this business without you?

Here’s to many more happy and productive years for you.

Barry Abrams

Thanks for this! And thanks again for the setup and training, I’m going to be spending a 10th of the time editing in the audition now. I’ll definitely be sending others your way!

Zack Sage

What a wonderful set up session I had with you! You were kind and so wonderful to work with. Thank you so much for being so sweet to me it really made my day.

Sonia Torres

I just wanted to thank you for all the help and extra time you spent helping me work out my workflow. I felt you went above and beyond to help me, and answered all my questions concerning mastering my audio.

Becky Ray Carter

He did it again!

Roy B. Yokelson, the “D.A.”- Doctor of Audio, helped me yesterday setting up Adobe Audition with Source Connect, creating a template, which makes it so easy to open SC, and then the AA template. He takes care of all the techie stuff that makes me hyperventilate.

Marie Hoffman

The Doc is always in when you need help. You’re outstanding, Roy (and you make a very nice kugel.)

Uncle Roy, thank you so much for being there for me. I am soooo happy you came into my VoiceOver journey. I couldn’t imagine as I advance and move my career into a “higher” level doing this without you. I have already learned some things but my goal is not just to be a “great” VoiceOver artist but to also be a “great” engineer with my work and I know that with you by my side learning from you that will be attainable.

Looking to keep working and learning from the best!

Sonia Torres

Uncle Roy, things are drastically improving in my setup and practical ability thanks to your advice. And to compliment that, I just bought a couple of proper mics and new interface. The world sounds better now!

Gabriel Porras

Hey Roy!

Just wanted to say thanks again for the Adobe Audition course last week. I thought I would share with you the results of the first job “AUR” (After Uncle Roy). This is another job for the same defense industry client. I played an earlier trial take of it vs. the final for my wife, and her eyes popped at the difference (she’s very critical, so the reaction was appreciated). The client also commented on the warmer tone and clarity.

Jon

Hi Uncle Roy,

Quick note to tell you I’ve done several auditions today and test drove your Twisted Wave Quick List 🌪 – worked like a charm!

I💜it!

Thank you!

Beth

First, I want to say how grateful I am for your tutelage in mastering audiobooks. I’ve applied it to a podcast I’m doing. Your mastering chain has worked VERY well in getting things loud enough without sounding crunched. Thanks a TON.

Rob Reider Voice

After spending most of the day moving the office computer to the studio and reconfiguring and downloading software ‘Uncle Roy’ Yokelson jumped online at 11pm. He worked with me for about 90 minutes to set all the shortcuts and key configurations in Adobe Audition so I can work on the weekend. Roy is amazing and a wonderful person.

Richard Crossman

THANK YOU so much for today’s tech session! You’re the best! Can’t wait to see you when we move back east! Bagel party!!!!!! Woo hoo!!!!!!!!!

Christine Brito

I’m TOTALLY happy with what you’ve taught me and it’s working great!! I’ll be finishing up the book in the next 48 hours and moving on to another one right away. It is SO nice working with you!

Rob Reider Voice

This audio is so great now; I haven’t felt this good in a long time. But you also helped me fix it so quick, and that is so very much appreciated. Thanks.

Tony Cobb

Thank you so much Uncle Roy!!!

I just booked the biggest job of my career so far – I am sure my audio being overhauled and upgraded was a huge part of that!!!!

THANK YOU!!!!! XO

Angela Colville

Voice Artist

I didn’t expect you to get back to me until this morning, since I sent my request on a Saturday morning, but you were on top of it! You’re the best!

Thanks so much for helping with this–I think I have everything I need now.

Warmly,

Aimee Ollman

Thanks so much for your help yesterday. You saved me.

My son is now a recurring character on a kids’ show “Super Wings” because of you!

Thanks so much.

Karen❤️❤️❤️

Thanks, Uncle Roy.

Thanks so much for the time you spent with me on Audition training, and for suggesting RX. You gave me a great launch. I’ve gotten into the weeds (in a good way) with editing, and it’s become a fun part of the process… onward!

Paul Vinger

Voice Over Actor

I wanted to say a BIG and hearty thank you for everything! You really know your stuff, sir. MUCH respect. I feel like I’m moving at warp speed in post, and my audio sounds better than ever!

Vesta Millard

Stop being so clever and creative, Uncle Roy!

Karin Barth

Home Studio Guidance

Uncle Roy is the 'Wonderland of Knowledge of Voiceover'

Antland Productions offers FREE home studio evaluations! To receive yours, simply record 10 seconds of room tone followed by a 30 second audition read, all in one file (do not separate the room tone from your VO read). Save as (or export as) firstname_raw.wav. Please, you must actually read something, not a conversational “Hi, Uncle Roy, this is me talking into my microphone – I didn’t have a script!”

If you have a ‘stack’ or know how to do post-production then do so and save again as firstname_final.wav (leave the room tone attached). Email both the raw and final files. I will also evaluate/critique/tweak your stack settings.

Email to: antlandprods@aol.com

Looking for a voiceover booth?

There are many options. Here are my favorite picks:

Other Home Studio Services:

Antland Productions is your one stop shop for everything audio!

Equipment Recommendations: PC or MAC, DAW or recording software, microphones, interfaces, headphones, and accessories

Internet connectivity (Connection Open, Source Connect, etc.)

Additionally, suggestions will be made to improve your recording space to attain ‘Broadcast Quality Audio’

Dottie Pearl Snake Eyes

Schedule your two-hour life changing Adobe Audition, Audacity,

Recording Technology Education

Uncle Roy’s “2 Hour Life Changing Adobe Audition Set Up & Training” session

International Voiceover Tech Support Available 25/8!

"There's never a wrong time or place to take or place a nap."

‘Normal’ business hours are 8 am to 1 am ET (2 am - it’s ‘lights out’!).

Is there ever sleep at Antland Productions?

Not too often! No matter where you are worldwide, Uncle Roy will do his best to accommodate your schedule.
